title: Delete last 3 static photos from the gallery

requirements.summary: Remove the last 3 static photos (gallery-photo-28.jpeg, gallery-photo-29.jpeg, gallery-photo-30.jpeg) from the hardcoded static photos array in the Gallery page, retaining only gallery-photo-01.jpeg through gallery-photo-27.jpeg
acceptanceCriteria: gallery-photo-28.jpeg, gallery-photo-29.jpeg, and gallery-photo-30.jpeg are no longer rendered in the Gallery page photo section
gallery-photo-01.jpeg through gallery-photo-27.jpeg continue to display correctly in the photo gallery grid
Dynamically fetched backend photos are unaffected and still displayed correctly
The photo gallery grid layout remains responsive and visually consistent with 27 static photos

file_operations.description: Remove the last 3 entries (gallery-photo-28.jpeg, gallery-photo-29.jpeg, gallery-photo-30.jpeg) from the hardcoded static photos array. Update the array to include only gallery-photo-01.jpeg through gallery-photo-27.jpeg. Ensure the Photos tab continues to render both the remaining 27 static photos and any dynamically fetched photos from the backend using the useGetAllPhotos hook. Verify that the grid layout remains responsive and visually consistent.
